summary: A simple retexture of the forges of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/3945/retexturedforge.png[/img]
[color=#ff0000][u][size=5][b]I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS MOD. THERE'S BETTER FORGE TEXTURES ON NEXUS.[/b][/size][/u][/color][b]

Forge Retexture[/b]
A simple retexture of the forges of Skyrim.

[b]Install:[/b]
Copy the downloaded "textures" folder into the Skyrim data folder.

[b]Uninstall:[/b]
Just delete "blacksmith" and "smelter" folders from the Skyrim data\textures\clutter folder.

[b]Notes:[/b]
This is my very first retexture so do not expect a masterpiece :)
I will release some updates soon.
[size=5] IF YOU HAVE ANY SUGGESTIONS, POST A COMMENT!![/size]
author: IranBez
